entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
